官.definition: government official; governmental; official; public; organ of the body; CL:個|个[ge4]

官二代.definition: children of officials; word created by analogy with 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]

官倒.definition: speculation by officials; profiteering by government employees; bureaucratic turpitude

官兵.definition: (military) officers and soldiers; officers and men; (old) government troops

官制.definition: the civil service system; the bureaucratic system

官名.definition: name of job in Imperial bureaucracy; official position

官員.definition: official (in an organization or government); administrator

官報私仇.definition: to take advantage of official post for personal revenge (idiom)

官場現形記.definition: Observations on the Current State of Officialdom, late Qing novel by Li Baojia 李寶嘉|李宝嘉[Li3 Bao3 jia4]

官威.definition: the haughty demeanor of a government official; high-and-mighty attitude towards the public

官媒.definition: official media; state media; (abbr. for 官方媒體|官方媒体)

官官相護.definition: officials shield one another (idiom); a cover-up

官宦人家.definition: family of a functionary (i.e. educated middle class in Qing times)

官差.definition: official business; government workmen; odd-job men

官廳水庫.definition: Guanting or Kuan-ting Reservoir in Hebei, one of the main water reservoirs serving Beijing

官復原職.definition: restored to one's official post; to send sb back to his former post

官微.definition: official (verified) account on Weibo 微博[Wei1bo2] or WeChat 微信[Wei1xin4]

官方.definition: government; official (approved or issued by an authority)

官桂.definition: Chinese cinnamon (Cinnamomum cassia); also written 肉桂[rou4 gui4]

官渡.definition: Guandu district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan

官渡之戰.definition: Battle of Guandu of 199 that established Cao Cao's 曹操[Cao2 Cao1] domination over north China, at Guandu (near modern 許昌|许昌[Xu3 chang1] in north Henan)

官渡區.definition: Guandu district of Kunming city 昆明市[Kun1 ming2 shi4], Yunnan

官田.definition: Guantian, the name of townships in various locations; Guantian, a district in Tainan 台南|台南[Tai2 nan2], Taiwan

官私合營.definition: public and private interests working together (idiom)

官箴.definition: rules of propriety for government officials

官網.definition: official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])

官職.definition: an official position; a job in the bureaucracy

官能.definition: organic function; physical faculty; sense (of sight, hearing, smell etc)

官艙.definition: (old) cabin class; second class (on a passenger ship)

官費.definition: government funded; paid by state stipend

官逼民反.definition: a government official drives the people to revolt (idiom); a minister provokes a rebellion by exploiting the people

官運亨通.definition: (of a political career) everything is going smoothly (idiom)
